text: Man and Superman was a drama play written by George Bernard Shaw in 1903. Man and Superman opened at The Royal Court Theatre in London on 23 May 1905. A movie version of the play was released in 1982. It stars Peter O'Toole. == Video== * Man and Superman (Bernard Shaw) 2015 National Theatre Live Category:Plays by George Bernard Shaw Category:20th-century plays Category:1903 works
title: Man and Superman
